title: Dictate time entry
description: Tell Siri to start a time entry with a custom description you can dictate.

title: Done for the day
description: Stop the running timer and view a custom Summary Report.

title: Start a Pomodoro
description: Start a Time Entry and set an alarm for 25 minutes.

title: Focus mode
description: Start a Time Entry, select a music playlist and turn on do not disturb.
